Name: Data Extraction from hard Drives
Task:
I'm seeking a professional data recovery service to salvage information from roughly ten non-functional internal desktop hard drives from the 90s and 2000s. The drives contain a mix of documents, spreadsheets, photos, videos, emails, and contacts.

Key Requirements:
- Expertise in data recovery from vintage hard drives
- Ability to handle physically defective drives
- Proficiency in retrieving various file formats
- Capacity to store retrieved data in cloud storage

The ideal candidate will have experience in data retrieval from obsolete technology, and can assure the secure handling and shipment of the drives. Please provide evidence of previous similar projects when bidding.

Name: Data Collection Specialist for Colorado-Specific Contact Lists
Task:
Project Overview:
We are seeking a detail-oriented Data Collection Specialist to compile comprehensive, Colorado-specific contact lists covering various categories such as conferences, schools, associations, and corporations. This is a temporary 40-hour project with a clear deliverable: clean, verified, and well-organized data delivered in a Google Sheet or CSV format.

Responsibilities:

Data Research & Collection:

Identify and source reliable websites, directories, and public records specific to Colorado.
Manually research and verify contact details (e.g., names, emails, phone numbers, websites, addresses).
Web Scraping & Automation:

Utilize Python (with libraries such as BeautifulSoup, Requests, Selenium, and Pandas) to automate the extraction of data from selected sources.
Develop scripts to handle pagination, extract detailed information, and format data for easy integration.
Data Cleaning & Organization:

Clean and structure the gathered data to ensure accuracy and consistency.
Organize the data into clearly labeled spreadsheets, categorizing by type (conferences, schools, associations, corporations).
Reporting & Communication:

Provide regular updates on progress and flag any issues or challenges.
Deliver the final data set along with your Python scripts and documentation of your process.
Requirements:

Proven experience in web scraping and data collection.
Strong proficiency in Python and its relevant libraries (BeautifulSoup, Requests, Selenium, Pandas).
Excellent attention to detail with a commitment to data accuracy.
Ability to work independently and communicate effectively.
Prior experience with similar data collection projects is a plus.
Familiarity with Google Sheets and data integration is beneficial.
Project Details:

Duration: 40 hours (temporary project)
Location: Remote
Deliverables:
A detailed, verified list of Colorado-specific contacts for each category.
Clean, organized data in a Google Sheet or CSV format.
Python scripts and documentation outlining the data collection and verification process.
Skills_Expertise: Data EntryData MiningData ScrapingMicrosoft ExcelLead GenerationList BuildingProspect List

Name: Data Collection from Facebook API in Lahore and Karachi
Task:
I am seeking a skilled and detail-oriented individual to assist with a project focused on analyzing gender-related interests through Facebook's Marketing API at the smallest geographic unit in Lahore and Karachi, Pakistan. The ideal candidate will have experience with data collection through APIs, and familiarity with how Pakistani firms use the Facebook marketing API. 

1 - Identify the Smallest Geographic Unit in Lahore:
1A - Research and determine the most granular administrative unit in Lahore (e.g., neighborhood, union council, ward, or equivalent) that can be queried using the Facebook API 
1B - Provide a detailed explanation of this unit and how it aligns with Facebook's geo-targeting capabilities.

2 - Data Collection through Facebookâ€™s Marketing API:
2A - Query Facebookâ€™s Marketing API for each gender-related interest and for all relevant geographic units in Lahore and Karachi 
2B - Collect data on the number of monthly active users (MAU) 2C - Organize and deliver the data in a clear, structured format (e.g., spreadsheet or database).

Name: Web Scraping Specialist for Automated Data Extraction from Job Boards
Task:
Description
We are looking for an experienced Octoparse expert to set up and maintain web crawlers for multiple German job boards. The initial task is to create and configure a reliable crawler for one website (your choice from our priority list). Upon successful completion, we will expand the scope to the remaining platforms.

Key Responsibilities
â€¢ Configure an Octoparse crawler capable of navigating and extracting data from one selected job board.
â€¢ Ensure the crawler identifies and extracts the specified fields in a precise order.
â€¢ Integrate daily data extraction results into our CRM through CSV exports (we handle the automation part).
â€¢ Implement robust solutions for IP blocks and CAPTCHAs (we can provide tools such as 2captcha/0captcha and rotating proxies).
â€¢ Deliver consistent, high-quality data and handle missing fields gracefully (leave them blank if not available).

Target Websites
Choose any one to begin with (and then proceed to the others if successful):

https://www.jobware.de/jobsuche
https://stellenmarkt.swffm.de/
https://de.jooble.org/
https://jobninja.com/
https://www.1a-stellenmarkt.de/
Data Fields (in order)
Company (Unternehmen)
Customer Type (Kundentyp)
Job URL
Source (Quelle)
Additional Info/Note (e.g. which position is open)
Street (StraÃŸe)
Postal Code (PLZ)
City (Ort)
Country (Land)
Website
Contact Person 
Phone Number 
E-Mail

Additionally, the crawler must search each of the German regions (Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg, Bayern, Berlin, Brandenburg, Bremen, Hamburg, Hessen, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Niedersachsen, Nordrhein-Westfalen, Rheinland-Pfalz, Saarland, Sachsen, Sachsen-Anhalt, Schleswig-Holstein, ThÃ¼ringen)

Requirements & Expectations
â€¢ Proven experience web scraping, preferably on dynamic websites.
â€¢ Familiarity with automation triggers for daily scraping tasks.
â€¢ Ability to circumvent or handle IP restrictions, rate limits, and CAPTCHAs.
â€¢ Deliver data in CSV format that will feed directly into our CRM.
â€¢ Complete initial crawler setup within 1â€“2 weeks.
â€¢ Willingness to adapt and expand to additional job boards once the first is working correctly.

Additional Notes
â€¢ We have partial configurations from past attempts but have not been able to successfully crawl these sites. We need an specialist to troubleshoot and finalize the process.
â€¢ Blank fields are acceptable if the data is truly unavailable. However, we strive to capture as many details as possible.
â€¢ If you have recommendations to enhance data quality (e.g., advanced scheduling, proxy solutions, captcha-solving strategies), please include these in your proposal.

What to Include in Your Proposal
â€¢ A summary of your Scrapimg experience and relevant projects.
â€¢ Outline of the approach and timeline for handling the first job board. (see in the list and choose your most fitting board)
â€¢ Proposed method for dealing with dynamic pages, IP blocks, and CAPTCHAs.
â€¢ Pricing and estimated delivery time for the initial setup, plus any separate fees for subsequent sites.

We look forward to receiving your proposal and working with a crawler expert who can deliver consistent, high-quality results on these job boards.

So what is the first Project Scope:
You will create a price offer for 1 Job Portal of your choice, like mention earlier.

Name: Develop a Custom Lead-Generating Marketing Application
Task:
Build a Web-Based Lead Generation & Automated Outreach Tool

Job Summary:
I am looking for a skilled software developer to build a custom web-based marketing application that automates lead generation and outreach for SEO and web development services. I have a video that will show you what I want. The application should be able to:

âœ… Extract thousands of domains based on entered keywords.
âœ… Scan websites for coding errors, search engine rankings, and primary keywords.
âœ… Generate detailed reports outlining issues and suggested services.
âœ… Automatically send reports via email to website owners.
âœ… Capture responses from interested clients and forward them for service fulfillment.
âœ… Support bulk processing with mass email functionality.

Core Features & Functionalities:

Keyword-Based Domain Extraction:

-User enters a list of keywords, and the tool scrapes relevant domain names.

Website Analysis & Error Detection:

-Automatically scans each domain for coding issues, SEO weaknesses, and search engine rankings.

Report Generation & Email Outreach:

-Prepares short reports highlighting identified issues.
Sends automated emails with the reports to website owners.

Lead Management & Forwarding:

-Captures responses from interested clients.
Allows easy forwarding of inquiries to external service providers.

Mass Email Capability:

-Enables bulk sending of reports to multiple domains at once.

User Dashboard:

-Simple web interface for entering keywords, managing reports, and tracking responses.

Ideal Candidate:
-Strong experience in web scraping and automation.
-Proficiency in backend development (Python, Node.js, PHP, or similar).
-Experience with email automation (SMTP, APIs like SendGrid, Mailgun).
-Ability to build simple dashboards with simple UI/UX.
-Familiarity with SEO tools and website auditing software is a plus.

-Deliverables:
âœ… Fully functional web-based marketing application hosted on my server.
âœ… Complete source code with proper documentation.
âœ… Integration with email APIs for automated report delivery.
âœ… Basic user interface to operate the tool with minimal technical expertise.
âœ… Testing & debugging to ensure smooth operation.

Budget & Timeline:
-Open to proposals but expect delivery within 3-6 weeks.
-Will discuss additional features.

How to Apply:
-Share relevant projects where you have built similar automation tools.
-Outline your approach to building this application and preferred technologies.
-Provide an estimated cost and timeline for project completion.

Looking forward to working with a talented developer to bring this tool to life! ðŸš€

Name: Research & Deal Sourcing Assistant for Business Acquisitions
Task:
We are dedicated to acquiring and growing exceptional small to medium-sized businesses in the US market. We are looking for a highly organized, detail-oriented, and proactive assistant to help with sourcing small business acquisition opportunities, conducting industry research, reaching out to business owners, and creating professional presentations.

The ideal candidate has exceptional English verbal and written skills, strong research abilities, and experience with ChatGPT and automation tools to improve efficiency. You should also be able to summarize findings in clear, polished PowerPoint presentations.

Responsibilities:
1. Deal Sourcing
Monitor business-for-sale platforms daily (BizBuySell, Axial, BizQuest, etc.).
Screen listings based on specific investment criteria.
Request and review Confidential Information Memorandums (CIMs).
Manage NDAs and organize deal-related documents.
Keep our deal tracking system updated.
Provide weekly reports on deal pipeline progress.

2. Industry Research
Conduct market research to evaluate industries and identify attractive investment opportunities.
Summarize key insights, trends, and opportunities.
Present findings in clear, well-structured PowerPoint presentations.

3. Outreach to Business Owners
Identify and reach out to small business owners who may be open to selling.
Draft and send professional, persuasive emails.
Maintain outreach records and follow up consistently.
Communicate professionally and confidently with business owners.

4. Automation & AI Efficiency
Use ChatGPT and other GenAI tools to streamline tasks such as deal analysis and email drafting.
Set up web scraping and email automation tools to improve efficiency.
Optimize workflows to save time and increase effectiveness.

5. Presentation & Reporting
Compile research and deal insights into professional PowerPoint presentations.
Create visually appealing summaries and key takeaways for internal decision-making.
Ensure presentations are clear, polished, and well-structured.

Requirements:
Exceptional English verbal and written communication skills (a must).
Strong research and analytical abilities.
Experience with business acquisition platforms (a plus but not required).
Proficiency in PowerPoint (must be able to create executive-level presentations).
Experience with ChatGPT and automation tools (e.g., web scraping, email sequencing).
Very high attention to detail, organized, and proactive.
We will be available to teach you most of the industry specific knowledge to help you perform the tasks.

Preferred Skills (Nice to Have):
Experience in M&A, private equity, or business brokerage.
Familiarity with CRMs or deal-tracking software.
Basic knowledge of financial statements.

This is a long-term role with opportunities for growth. If you are detail-oriented, tech-savvy, and excited about deal sourcing, industry research, and presenting insights professionally, Iâ€™d love to hear from you!
Skills_Expertise: Data EntryMicrosoft PowerPointChatGPTEmail CommunicationFile ManagementPresentationsMarket ResearchLead GenerationAdministrative Support
